techmeme.title: Microsoft adds a "computer use" tool in Copilot Studio to let AI agents use websites and desktop apps; the feature is designed to detect UI changes dynamically (Tom Warren/The Verge)
TikTok begins testing Footnotes, a Community Notes-like feature to add "more context" to videos, in the US; Footnotes won't affect algorithmic ranking (Karissa Bell/Engadget)
CISA says it will extend funding to Mitre, which runs the CVE Program, and "there will be no lapse in critical CVE services", after Mitre said funding expired (Sergiu Gatlan/BleepingComputer)
Nvidia GeForce RTX 5060 Ti 16GB review: great value and performance, and GDDR7 offers more bandwidth, but the GPU's pricing and availability remain uncertain (Jarred Walton/Tom's Hardware)
SEC filing: AMD estimates new US export rules for its MI308 chips to China will cost ~$800M in inventory, purchase commitments, and related reserves charges (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
